mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(comment_content, job_id, pf_id, user_id, created_at) VALUES(#{commentContent}, #{jobId}, #{pfId}, #{userId}, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET comment_content = #{commentContent}, updated_at = now()
mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.comment_content, u.user_nickname, u.user_profile_img, c.created_at FROM user u LEFT JOIN comment c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE job_id = #{jobId}
